release-updates.text: New release out! <clickhere>Click here</clickhere> to read all about the latest changes.

cookie.consent: Натискайки "Приеми всички бисквитки", Вие се съгласявате на запазването на бисквитки на Вашето устройство за подобряване на уебсайт навигацията и анализиране как се използва той.
cookie.settings: Когато посещавате уебсайт, информация може да бъде запазвана на вашия браузър във формата на бисквитки. Тази информация може да бъде за Вас и Вашите преференции на това устройство. В повечето случай тази информация се използва за най-добрата работа на уебсайта. Някои уебсайтове я използват за маркетинг цели. Alkemio не позволява реклами на този уебсайт и разпознава само два типа бисквитки.
cookie.technical: Технически необходими биквитки: позволяват Ви да навигирате и да използвате базовите функции и запазват преференции.
cookie.analysis: Анализиращи бисквитки: позволяват ни да проследим как посетителите използват нашите услуги, за да подобрим потребителското изживяване.

tagline.title: Tagline
tagline.description: Explain in one sentence what this Space is about.

background.title: Background
background.description: Give a brief overview of the need for this Space and how it came about.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: What will this Space change? How will people and organizations be affected?

vision.title: What is this community about?

who.title: Who should be involved?

displayName.title: Заглавие
displayName.description: Try to keep it short, descriptive and engaging

tagline.title: Challenge Statement
tagline.description: Explain in one sentence what this challenge is about. It is also possible to frame it as a question, starting with How might we...

background.title: Текуща реалност
background.description: Give a brief impression of the current state of the challenge. Think of the what, where, when and who.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Give a brief overview of how this Challenge is embedded in the wider picture. What is its impact? Why is it here?

vision.title: Бъдеща визия
vision.description: What does success look like? What should a solution to this Challenge comprise?

who.title: Who
who.description: Think of individuals, organizations, public bodies, research institutes, etc.

tags.title: Етикети
tags.description: Enter words that are key to the Challenge to make it stand out and easier to find.

displayName.title: Заглавие
displayName.description: Try to keep it short, descriptive and engaging

tagline.title: Слоган
tagline.description: In one sentence, explain what this opportunity is about. Think of what and what for.

background.title: Description
background.description: Describe the idea and the impact it will have on the Challenge. Please note that this is a living document, it can be updated any time.

impact.title: Влияние
impact.description: What will this Opportunity change? How will people and organizations be affected, for good or bad?

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Describe the idea and the impact it will have on the Challenge. Please note that this is a living document, it can be updated any time.

who.title: Who
who.description: Describe the people and organizations who are currently working on this Opportunity.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Enter words that are key to your Opportunity to make it stand out and easier to find.

activity-tooltip.headline: Alkemio расте! Общо, платформата в момента съдържа:

callout-creation.title: What do you want to ask your community?

info-step.title: Детайли
info-step.type-comments-help: Select ‘Comments’ when you want people to answer in a simple text format, like a messageboard.
info-step.type-posts-help: Select Posts when you want people to answer in a card format.
info-step.type-whiteboards-help: Select ‘Whiteboards’ when you want people to answer on a visual whiteboard, allowing them to draw and use text.

info-step.title: Details
info-step.tags-help-text: Add free form tags to help quickly convey the key information about the Post. Good tags also help make the Post easier to find in searches.

visuals-step.title: Visuals
visuals-step.headline: Congratulations, you have now successfully created an Post!
visuals-step.explanation: To further personalize your Post, please consider adding visuals such as a Banner to the Post.
visuals-step.bottom-note: You will still have the possibility to change these visuals under the settings tab as well as adding attachments and a Banner for the Dashboard card.

innovationHub.foreignJourney: This {{journey}} is not in the selection of {{space}}. You are anyway very welcome to contribute. Enjoy exploring!

outsideOfSpace.forum: This is the general Alkemio Forum, outside of the {{space}} space. You are very much invited to explore and contribute!
outsideOfSpace.challenges: Here you can find all Challenges that are hosted on Alkemio, also the ones that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy exploring!
outsideOfSpace.contributors: Here you can find all people and organizations that are contributing on Alkemio, also in Spaces that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy connecting!

innovationHub.goToMainPage: Interested in collaborating in other Spaces? Click here to see them all on the universal Alkemio homepage.

dashboard.description: Here you can see the summary for this {{entity}}. Navigate through the other tabs to see more detailed information!

about.description: Here you can explore the context of this {{entity}}, as well as the community.

explore.description: Here you can contribute your insights to understanding the context. It is about surfacing up the wisdom of the community.

discussions.description: Here you can read and participate in discussions around this {{entity}}.

whiteboards.description: Whiteboards can be seen as digital whiteboards. Here you can create a whiteboard for this {{entity}} as well as find ones created by the others.

subentities.description: Here you can explore the **{{entities}}** hosted in this {{parentEntity}}. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.
subentities.empty-list: There are no {{entities}} in this {{parentEntity}} yet.

archived-notice.archived-space: This Space is currently archived. Interested in bringing it back to life? <contact>Click here</contact> to contact Alkemio.

demo-notice.demo-space: This is a Demo Space. <alkemio>Click here</alkemio> to collaborate in active Spaces.
demo-notice.demo-journey: This {{journey}} is within a Demo Space. <alkemio>Click here</alkemio> to collaborate in active Spaces.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.public: Public: this space and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a member.
visibility.private: Private: this space is visible for everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible for members.

membership.title: Membership
membership.noApplicationRequired: No Application required: all Alkemio users can directly join, without you having to review their application. Others will first have to create an Alkemio account, but can then also join this Space directly.
membership.applicationRequired: Application required: if people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitationOnly: Invitation only: users can only become a member after you’ve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host organization: allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.

memberActions.title: Member Actions
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createChallenges: Create Challenges: allow members to create Challenges in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Challenges yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Challenge.

innovation-flow.description: Here you change the status of this Opportunity or choose a different Flow Template to follow.

innovation-packs.save-new-for-details: Save the new Innovation Pack to edit the rest of the details

innovationHubs.saveForMoreDetails: Save the new $t(common.innovation-hub) to edit the rest of the details

search.title: Разгледай предизвикателствата
search.subtitle: Enter your search terms (e.g. 'innovation') below to find matching challenges. Please note that on Alkemio, there are both public and private challenge Spaces. Here you can find all challenges from the public Spaces. Challenges from private Spaces are visible when you are signed in and a member of that particular Space.
search.placeholder: Търси предизвикателство в Алкемио по ключови думи...
search.no-results: No results matched your search terms.

side-note.title: The Alkemio Structure
side-note.description: At Alkemio, all Challenges are part of a Space. Each Space has it's specific frame of reference, in which Challenges are used to understand the issues at hand.

my-search.title: Explore other Challenges visible to you
my-search.subtitle: Challenges in public Spaces are visible to everyone. Challenges in private Spaces are visible to members only. Enter your search terms (e.g. ‘innovation’) below to find matching Challenges.

my.title: My Challenges
my.subtitle: Този раздел показва предизвикателствата, в които участвате.

other.title: Other Challenges within My Spaces
other.subtitle: Here you'll find the other challenges hosted by the Spaces that you are member of.

welcome.join: Искаш ли да се присъединиш към общността и да видиш повече?

existing-user.subheader: Добре дошли отново! Продължете оттам, докъдето сте стигнали, и започнете да откривате нови предизвикателства.

new-to-alkemio.subheader: Лесно ангажиране на всички по ефективен и смислен начин, което ви позволява да управлявате предизвикателствата си и да оказвате въздействие.

space.body: Всяко Пространство е общност с обособено пространство за споделени Предизвикателства. За свързване, сътрудничество и иновации заедно.
space.body1: For Users, Spaces are free to join. Explore the membership options, including for public and private Spaces.

organizations.subheader: Лицата, които искат да създават иновации.

footer.headline: More about Alkemio? Visit our website, contact us or take a look at our github repository

opportunities.description: HТук могат да бъдат разгледани Възможностите, които ще помогнат за напредък по Предизвикателството. Те могат да се филтрират по ключови думи, за да видите само тези, от които се интересувате.

community.description: Here you can explore the Community. See the Users that are contributing, as well as updates that have been shared by the leads.

agreements.description:
Agreements are the formation of concrete next steps to be taken. This new functionality will be available soon.

Ideas, suggestions? Please reach out!

leading-organizations.title: Водещи организации ({{count}})

whiteboard.subheader: Create your custom visualization and share it with others.
whiteboard.no-whiteboards: No whiteboards have been created yet. Be the first to add one.

state.checkedout: Someone else is currently editing this Whiteboard

delete.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete this whiteboard? The action is irreversible.

steps.naming: Define a suitable name for your whiteboard. What will your whiteboard capture?
steps.templating: Choose from the list of templates if you want to use it as a blueprint for your whiteboard.
steps.completing: The whiteboard will be created with the following parameters

create-dialog.no-template-selected: To see a preview of the template please select one.

template.no-templates: There are no templates defined here yet. Be the first to add one.
template.how-to: To create a template create a new whiteboard or use an existing one and save it as a template.

space.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this Space can be used in every Challenge and Opportunity that this Space hosts.

challenge.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this Challenge can be used in every Opportunity that is in the scope of this Challenge.

login.title: Sign in to Alkemio
login.register: Don’t have an Alkemio account yet? <signup>Click here to sign up.</signup>

about.title: Преосмисляне на сътрудничеството
about.description: Алкемио поставя Предизвикателствата в центъра, като всяко Предизвикателство осигурява централно, неутрално място за колаборация.

error.title: О, не!
error.line2: Моля, уверете се, че сървърът ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) съществува и презаредете страницата.
error.line3: Ако грешката все още съществува, моля, свържете се с нашия екип.

four-ou-four.message: Ресурсът, който търсите, не може да бъде намерен.

registration.header: Създайте акаунт, за да използвате Алкемио
registration.introduction:
Welcome at Alkemio! Alkemio makes it easy to manage Challenges and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. Challenges take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
registration.terms: Приемам <terms>Правилата за Ползване </terms> и <privacy>Политиката за Сигурност</privacy>.

accept-terms.introduction:
Alkemio makes it easy to manage Challenges and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. Challenges take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
accept-terms.tooltip: Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue

registration-success.header: Hi, thank you for signing up!

verification-success.header: Благодарим, че потвърдихте имейл адреса си!
verification-success.subheader: Профилът ви е напълно активиран. Насладете се!
verification-success.message: Please do consider filling out all posts of your profile. It helps with both applying to join communities and with others being able to connect with you.

message.initial: Please enter your email address below to receive a recovery code that will allow to reset your password.

verification.message:
Потребителите на Алкемио трябва да потвърдят имейл адреса си.

Моля, въведете своя имейл по-долу, за да получите линк за потвърждение.

verification-required.message:
You are nearly there... One last step is to verify your email.
Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.

If you have not received an email, click on this link to send again.

associated-organizations.title: Свързани организации
associated-organizations.help: Организации, с които този потребител е свързан

verifiable-credentials.title: Данни за идентификация
verifiable-credentials.help: Идентификационните данни, които потребителят притежава, дадени му от доверени страни.

your-credentials.title: Моите данни за идентификация
your-credentials.description: Алкемио кешира твоите идентификационни данни в портфейл в облачното пространство. Тези данни ще ти дадат достъп до привилегии в цялата платформа.

authentication-required.header: TСтраницата, която се опитвате да достъпите изисква да се впишете в профила си.
authentication-required.subheader: Моля, впишете се в профила си или се регистрирайте!

general.title: Общи
general.subtitle: Този раздел позволява избора на предпочитания относно получаването на съобщения

user-administration.title: Администрация на Платформата
user-administration.subtitle: Този раздел е видим само за глобалните администратори на платформата

community-administration.title: Администрация на Общността
community-administration.subtitle: Този раздел позволява избора на предпочитания относно администрацията на общността

user-communication.title: Mentions and messaging
user-communication.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging

organization-communication.title: Organization mentions and messaging
organization-communication.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging to organizations you manage

forum.title: Forum
forum.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding activities in the Forum

help-dialog.title: Looking for help?
help-dialog.text:
We want to help you successfully use the Alkemio platform, and to do so we want to make the process of using it and interacting easier. This is how you can have an impact on the topics you care about.

Click on the icons below to find answers to your questions, contact the Alkemio team for support or just get started!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Looking for tips & tricks? Find them in the blog posts here!

forum.title: Questions, suggestions, or feedback? Get in touch with the Alkemio team or other users of the platform!

session.default: Не може да се получи информация за сесията!

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Please enter a new password within the next 15 minutes to complete your password reset.
messages.verification-flow-expired: Връзката за потвърждение е изтекла. Моля, заявете нова като въведете имейл адреса си още веднъж.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one by submitting your email once again.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: You're trying to sign in with a LinkedIn/Microsoft account, but the associated email address was already used before. Please sign in with this e-mail address and password or try to reset the password. If that doesn't work, please send an email to support@alkem.io.

postLocation.title: Post location
postLocation.label: Contributing to Callout
postLocation.reminder: Be careful changing the Posts location. Moving the Post to another Callout will make it disappear from the current Callout. This might make it difficult for people, including the person who created this Post, to retrieve it. Note that you can only move Posts within the same Space, Challenge or Opportunity.
postLocation.success: Successfully moved Post to the new Callout.
postLocation.error: Something went wrong when moving the Post, please try again.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this Post?
